extendedIngredients.name: confectioners' sugar
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 1/2 pounds confectioners' sugar, about 5 cups unsifted

extendedIngredients.name: non-fat milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk (see note above)

extendedIngredients.name: pecans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cups coarsely chopped pecans or walnuts

extendedIngredients.name: process american cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 ounces pasteurized process cheese, Velveeta, cubed

recipes.title: Cakespy: Velveeta Fudge
recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Lightly grease a 9 x 9-inch square pan; set to the side.                                                                                                                            2                                                                            In a large saucepan over medium heat butter and cheese cubes together, stirring frequently until smooth; remove from heat.                                                                                                                             3                                                                            Sift together confectioners' sugar and cocoa; add to cheese, mixing well.                                                                                                                             4                                                                            Stir in non-fat dry milk (if you've chosen to use it), vanilla and nuts, mixing until well distributed. The mixture will be very stiff.                                                                                                                            5                                                                            Using your hands, remove candy from pan and press firmly and evenly into the pan; chill until firm and cut into squares.

steps.step: Lightly grease a 9 x 9-inch square pan; set to the side.
In a large saucepan over medium heat butter and cheese cubes together, stirring frequently until smooth; remove from heat.
Sift together confectioners' sugar and cocoa; add to cheese, mixing well.
Stir in non-fat dry milk (if you've chosen to use it), vanilla and nuts, mixing until well distributed. The mixture will be very stiff.
Using your hands, remove candy from pan and press firmly and evenly into the pan; chill until firm and cut into squares.
